description: Permite comparar aplicaciones concretas entre si en términos de privacidad.

options.content:
# Dashboard de Comparaciones de Apps en Privacidad

---

panels.description: Nombre de la aplicación A seleccionada.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  app_title 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.az_metadata
WHERE 
  app_hash IN (SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageA')

panels.title: Nombre de la App A

panels.description: Número de permisos que solicita la App $packageA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(permission_name) 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.app_uses_permission
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashA'

panels.title: Permisos Solicitados

panels.description: Número de permisos custom que solicita la App $packageA

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(permission_name) 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.app_uses_permission
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashA'
  AND 
  permission_name NOT IN (SELECT permission_name FROM app_warehouse.android_permission)

panels.title: Permisos Custom Solicitados

panels.description: Nombre de la aplicación B seleccionada.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  app_title 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.az_metadata
WHERE 
  app_hash IN (SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageB')

panels.title: Nombre de la App B

panels.description: Número de permisos que solicita la App $packageB

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(permission_name) 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.app_uses_permission
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashB'

panels.title: Permisos Solicitados

panels.description: Número de permisos custom que solicita la App $packageB

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(permission_name) 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.app_uses_permission
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashB'
  AND 
  permission_name NOT IN (SELECT permission_name FROM app_warehouse.android_permission)

panels.title: Permisos Custom Solicitados

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  score_value 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.score
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashA'
  AND 
  privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'

panels.description: Peso que aporta cada grupo de permisos solicitado por la app $packageA a la Métrica

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUM(r.rank_value), a.android_permission_group_name 
FROM 
  permission_rank AS r JOIN android_permission AS a
ON 
  r.permission_name=a.permission_name
WHERE 
  r.permission_name IN (
    SELECT
      permission_name
    FROM
      app_uses_permission
    WHERE
      app_hash='$hashA'
  )
  AND
  a.android_permission_group_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  a.android_permission_group_name
ORDER BY
  SUM(r.rank_value) DESC

panels.title: Peso que aporta cada grupo de permisos a la métrica

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  score_value 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.score
WHERE 
  app_hash='$hashB'
  AND 
  privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'

panels.description: Peso que aporta cada grupo de permisos solicitado por la app $packageB a la Métrica

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  SUM(r.rank_value), a.android_permission_group_name 
FROM 
  permission_rank AS r JOIN android_permission AS a
ON 
  r.permission_name=a.permission_name
WHERE 
  r.permission_name IN (
    SELECT
      permission_name
    FROM
      app_uses_permission
    WHERE
      app_hash='$hashB'
  )
  AND
  a.android_permission_group_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  a.android_permission_group_name
ORDER BY
  SUM(r.rank_value) DESC

panels.title: Peso que aporta cada grupo de permisos a la métrica

panels.description: Evolución del valor de la Métrica $privacy_rank_name para la app $packageA en función de las versiones de la misma.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  a.version_code AS "Código de Versión", s.score_value AS "Valor de la Métrica" 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.score AS s JOIN app AS a
ON
  s.app_hash=a.hash
WHERE 
  a.package='$packageA'
  AND
  s.privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'
ORDER BY
 a.version_code

panels.title: Evolución de la Métrica $privacy_rank_name para $packageA

panels.description: Aplicaciones sugeridas según el valor de la métrica.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  a.package AS "Nombre de Paquete", a.version_name AS "Versión", s.score_value AS "Métrica"
FROM
  app AS a JOIN score AS s
ON
  a.hash=s.app_hash
WHERE
  a.category='$categoryA'
  AND
  s.privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'
  AND
  s.score_value < (SELECT score_value FROM app_warehouse.score WHERE app_hash='$hashA' AND privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name')
ORDER BY s.score_value DESC

panels.title: Otras sugerencias en $categoryA

panels.description: Evolución del valor de la Métrica $privacy_rank_name para la app $packageB en función de las versiones de la misma.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  a.version_code AS "Código de Versión", s.score_value AS "Valor de la Métrica" 
FROM 
  app_warehouse.score AS s JOIN app AS a
ON
  s.app_hash=a.hash
WHERE 
  a.package='$packageB'
  AND
  s.privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'
ORDER BY
 a.version_code

panels.title: Evolución de la Métrica $privacy_rank_name para $packageB

panels.description: Aplicaciones sugeridas según el valor de la métrica.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  a.package AS "Nombre de Paquete", a.version_name AS "Versión", s.score_value AS "Métrica"
FROM
  app AS a JOIN score AS s
ON
  a.hash=s.app_hash
WHERE
  a.category='$categoryB'
  AND
  s.privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name'
  AND
  s.score_value < (SELECT score_value FROM app_warehouse.score WHERE app_hash='$hashB' AND privacy_rank_name='$privacy_rank_name')
ORDER BY s.score_value DESC

panels.title: Otras sugerencias en $categoryB

targets.rawSql: SELECT privacy_policy_url FROM app_warehouse.az_metadata WHERE app_hash = '$hashA' LIMIT 50
SELECT privacy_policy_url FROM app_warehouse.az_metadata WHERE app_hash = '$hashB' LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT privacy_rank_name FROM privacy_rank WHERE privacy_rank_name = "RPNDroid"
list.description: Métrica de Privacidad para utilizar en los gráficos.
list.label: Métrica de Privacidad
list.name: privacy_rank_name
list.query: SELECT privacy_rank_name FROM privacy_rank WHERE privacy_rank_name = "RPNDroid"

list.definition: SELECT package FROM app WHERE hash IN (SELECT app_hash FROM az_metadata WHERE rating_count > 1);
list.description: Nombre de paquete de la aplicación seleccionada
list.label: Nombre de paquete de la app A
list.name: packageA
list.query: SELECT package FROM app WHERE hash IN (SELECT app_hash FROM az_metadata WHERE rating_count > 1);

list.definition: SELECT version_name FROM app WHERE package='$packageA';
list.description: Versión de la App A seleccionada
list.label: Versión de la App A
list.name: version_nameA
list.query: SELECT version_name FROM app WHERE package='$packageA';

list.definition: SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageA' AND version_name='$version_nameA'
list.description: Hash de la App A seleccionada
list.label: Hash de la App A
list.name: hashA
list.query: SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageA' AND version_name='$version_nameA'

list.definition: SELECT category FROM app WHERE package='$packageA' AND version_name='$version_nameA'
list.description: Categoría de la App A seleccionada
list.label: Categoría de la App A
list.name: categoryA
list.query: SELECT category FROM app WHERE package='$packageA' AND version_name='$version_nameA'

list.definition: SELECT package FROM app WHERE hash IN (SELECT app_hash FROM az_metadata WHERE rating_count > 1);
list.description: Nombre de paquete de la aplicación seleccionada
list.label: Nombre de paquete de la app B
list.name: packageB
list.query: SELECT package FROM app WHERE hash IN (SELECT app_hash FROM az_metadata WHERE rating_count > 1);

list.definition: SELECT version_name FROM app WHERE package='$packageB';
list.description: Versión de la App B seleccionada
list.label: Versión de la App B
list.name: version_nameB
list.query: SELECT version_name FROM app WHERE package='$packageB';

list.definition: SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageB' AND version_name='$version_nameB'
list.description: Hash de la App B seleccionada
list.label: Hash de la App B
list.name: hashB
list.query: SELECT hash FROM app WHERE package='$packageB' AND version_name='$version_nameB'

list.definition: SELECT category FROM app WHERE package='$packageB' AND version_name='$version_nameB'
list.description: Categoría de la App B seleccionada
list.label: Categoría de la App B
list.name: categoryB
list.query: SELECT category FROM app WHERE package='$packageB' AND version_name='$version_nameB'

title: Comparación de Apps en Privacidad
